Package io.ib67.astralflow.api.external

Class AstralExtension

java.lang.Object
io.ib67.astralflow.api.external.AstralExtension
@AvailableSince("0.1.0") public abstract class AstralExtension extends Object
A class that represents an extension.

Registering your own contents' by subclassing this first.
Remember to call registerThis() in your constructor.
Also check the doc.
